{"id":703888096,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1653116225,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/703888096/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Root Equals Sum of Children","memory":"12.6 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkTree(TreeNode* root) {\n        return root->val==root->left->val+root->right->val;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"root-equals-sum-of-children","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
